item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Introduction Kubevisor brings easy supervision to your Kubernetes cluster. It provides a simple way to declare how your infrastructure should be monitored and takes care of the rest. Probes A probe is a simple Docker container performing a healthcheck. See it in action: --- apiVersion: kubevisor.io/v1 kind: Check metadata: name: probe-google-access labels: notify-slack: "yes" spec: image: name: kubevisor-probes/check-curl:latest pullPolicy: Always env: - name: HOST value: https://google.com schedule: every 5 minutes Notifiers Just like a probe, a notifier is a simple Docker container performing the notification to an external service.
